positive_examples: This is an example of religious war.
The religious war demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed religious war in this context.
A typical case of religious war would involve these features.
The concept of religious war applies here.
A war primarily motivated by religious differences or conflicts between different faith communities.
negative_examples: This is an example of civil war, not religious war.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CivilWar, or other types of War

definition: Armed conflict motivated primarily by religious differences or goals.
